title: Revival Conference
description: A powerful gathering for worship, impartation, and revival. Join us for a life-changing encounter! Speakers from across the region, prophetic ministry, and healing sessions.

title: Youth Camp
description: A fun and faith-filled camp for youth to grow, connect, and be equipped for their calling. Includes workshops, games, and worship nights.

title: Discipleship Training (Past)
description: Intensive discipleship and leadership training for all ages. Be equipped to make a difference! Includes guest speakers and certificate awards.

title: Prayer And Fasting
description: Join us for a powerful season of prayer and fasting as we seek God's presence, breakthrough, and spiritual renewal together. Experience transformation, unity, and fresh vision for your life and ministry.

title: Discipleship Training
description: Join us for an intensive discipleship training designed to equip believers for effective ministry and spiritual growth. Open to all ages and backgrounds. Includes breakout sessions and Q&A.

title: Kapenguria Mission Trip
description: Be part of our mission outreach to Kapenguria! Experience hands-on ministry, evangelism, and community service as we share the love of Christ. Includes medical camp and children's ministry.

title: Revival Youth Conference
description: A powerful youth conference focused on revival, worship, and empowerment. Connect with other young believers and ignite your passion for Christ! Includes worship concerts and leadership workshops.
